abstract: Using Symbolic Computation with Maple, we can discover lots of (rigorously-proved!) facts about Standard Young Tableaux, in particular the distribution of the entries in any specific cell, and the sorting probabilities.
publication_venue: 12 pages. Accompanied by a Maple package and many output files available from https://sites.math.rutgers.edu/~zeilberg/mamarim/mamarimhtml/syt.html
